evidence.text: Search in 12 documents found 2 total matches: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief (tokens 7552-7752) and First Amended Class Action Complaint (tokens 7742-7942). Both matches refer to 'Psychological Services Unit (PSU)' and 'PSR' forms, not a court-appointed monitor. No document contains 'monitor' in context of court-appointed or agreed-upon monitor.
